mapper.delete: delete from photo_love where photo_num=#{photo_num} and id=#{id}
delete from diary_love where diary_num=#{diary_num} and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from photo_love where photo_num=#{photo_num} and id=#{id}
select * from diary_love where diary_num=#{diary_num} and id=#{id}
mapper.update: update photo set love=#{love} where photo_num=#{photo_num}
update diary set love=#{love} where diary_num=#{diary_num}
